testcase.classname: As an administrator I want to be able to access courses categories via API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request is sent to the /api/categories endpoint with valid authorization,
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/categories" path parameters........................passed * The api user sends a GET request and saves the returned response..........passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the "remark" information in the response body is "success"..passed * The api user verifies the "Online-Education-871", "/store/1/default_images/categories_icons/code.png", 216, 326, 883, "en" and "Online Education" information of the item at 1 in the response body..passed
